subject: All Star Games
lead_paragraph: It remains the most stunning sequence in All-Star Game history: Carl Hubbell’s consecutive strikeouts of Babe Ruth, Lou Gehrig, Jimmie Foxx, Al Simmons and Joe Cronin in 1934.
snippet: It remains the most stunning sequence in All-Star Game history: Carl Hubbell’s consecutive strikeouts of Babe Ruth, Lou Gehrig, Jimmie Foxx, Al Simmons and Joe Cronin in 1934.
